ing: 2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste
des: "This is the recipe if you've been trying to imitate the one you had on Carnival Cruise Lines.  Serve in chilled soup bowls, and garnish with fresh sliced strawberries."
ins: Puree strawberries, milk, cream and sour cream in a blender or food processor until smooth.  Stir in sugar to taste.  Chill 8 hours or overnight in refrigerator before serving.
